name: The Prime Book
blurb: Photographer Peter Freed's portraits of these amazing women and each woman's essay redefines what it means to be a woman in her Prime.

name: Faces of Iceland
blurb: A collection of compelling film portraits and stories of those that bring life to the landscapes of an iconic nation.

name: No Evil Project Exhibit: Redefining Stereotypes
blurb: Photos of 1,000+ people posing as the three wise monkeys to humanize labels and show that anyone can do good no matter who they are.

name: Fatherless by Suicide
blurb: Fatherless by Suicide is a collaborative storytelling project by and for sons whose fathers died by suicide.

name: The Rooms Project - 100 Portraits of Addiction Recovery
blurb: Sober photographer's photo and audio story series on individuals living in recovery from addiction and alcoholism.

name: With Love Project - Hardbound Book
blurb: We are producing a limited edition book documenting our search to find people who create things with a passion and purpose.

name: "An Equal Difference" Intellect & Gender Equality in Iceland
blurb: For a world drowning in inequality. A ‘photo storybook’ of tales and ideas from Iceland, a land of gender equality. Well, almost.

name: Unique photo book highlighting the beauty of street vendors
blurb: A photography book filled with amazing pictures showcasing the diversity in colors and the life of street vendors in Hanoi.

name: Underneath We Are Women
blurb:
100 women, 100 bodies, 100 stories!
A photobook showcasing the diversity of women through honest and raw photographs.

name: Show Me Your You - Prompt Cards for Portrait Photographers
blurb: Show Me Your You is a deck of emotive prompt cards for portrait photographers who want to take human connection to the next level.

name: Limit(less) - LGBTQ African Immigrants
blurb: Documenting LGBTQ African Immigrant Stories in North America and Europe

name: Indigenous Knowledge and the Box of Treasures
blurb: We are collaborating with the Kwakwaka'wakw people to create a book of portrait photography and interviews about their culture.

name: Skin Tones - A Portrait Photography Art Book
blurb: Skin Tones - A coffee table book of artistic portraits that aims to capture as much ethnic diversity as possible.

name: No Mother, No Child // Photography Project
blurb: I will take photographs of the Colombian mothers whose children were adopted internationally, to tell their own unique stories.

name: Pop-up Family Portrait Studio
blurb: A photographic journey into families in Delhi

name: Galactic Pinups 2019 Calendar
blurb: A Pinup Calendar featuring your favorite characters from a galaxy far, far away.

name: Suriname's indigenous peoples portrayed in 124 photographs
blurb: Witness Suriname's indigenous current way of living, from city life in its capital Paramaribo to life in the Amazonian rain forest.

name: 2020 Zodiac Calendar from Macabre Queen Studio
blurb: We will be creating a Zodiac Calendar for 2020, featuring the 12 Zodiacs as an art piece.

name: Remastered Original Photogravures by Edward S. Curtis
blurb: Photogravure prints made from Edward Curtis' own glass plate negatives, passed down to his great-grandson.

name: Cara Nicole AzPowergirl Cosplay 13 Month 2020 Calendar!
blurb:
Cara Nicole AzPowergirl 13 Month Roaring 20's
 2020 Cosplay Calendar

name: Mobile Light Diffuser: Magazine Quality Headshots On-The-Go
blurb: Mobile light diffuser for outdoor portraits, headshots, and selfies.

name: Sun Salutations is a Yoga Greeting Card Company
blurb: Featuring inspiring images that support the diversity of the yoga community

name: Tale of Men Magazine: Issue 7 & 8
blurb: a photography and storytelling project focused on the gay communities and their stories

name: Me Myself and I : A Whimsical Look at Life in Lockdown
blurb: A photobook of surreal self isolation portraits in the time of COVID19

name: Tale of Men Zine Issue 9 & 10 & 11
blurb: photographs and personal stories of gay men, celebrating intimacy, love, sexuality, and more.

name: Galactic Pinups 2022 Calendar
blurb: A Pinup Calendar featuring your favorite fiction and fantasy characters!

name: AleX - The Book
blurb: AleX is a diary of a transitioning period, about a character of our time and our future.
